title: Hawaiian Optics logo
content:
My friends

Please help me id these fonts used on the logo of Hawaiian Optics

Thanks

Miguel

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Hawaiian Optics logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213048/http:/typophile.com/files/Hawaiian%20Optics%20logo.jpg) | 14.51 KB |

 [‹ Neptune type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213048/http:/typophile.com/node/44415 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID SAGMEISTER ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213048/http:/typophile.com/node/44410 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernando

comments.content:
Make sure the image is RGB so everyone can see it.

- Lex

Thanks

here the link to id the word “optics”

[http://www.hawaiianoptics.com/Hawaiian.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213048/http:/www.hawaiianoptics.com/Hawaiian.jpg "http://www.hawaiianoptics.com/Hawaiian.jpg")

thanks again

Miguel

I’m tempted to say it’s a [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213048/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squoosh) [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213048/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=compacta&sample_text=OPTICS&sample_size=74), but not quite.
